title: Dodolipyo
alternative_title: A Repeat Sign ; A Repeated Sign ; Dodolipyo ; Recurring Sign ; 도돌이표 ; 反复记号
status: A Repeat Sign ; A Repeated Sign ; Dodolipyo ; Recurring Sign ; 도돌이표 ; 反复记号
description:
Description :
        Somyi loses her lover, Maru, and lives a hopeless life ahead of her wedding. Then, a mysterious shaman, Yeon-hwa, appears in front of her.

'Kang Maru, do you want to see him again?'

With the power of her softening, Somyi returns to her past four years ago overnight, but... A completely different Maru appears in front of Somyi, and everything goes wrong for Somyi, who returns to her past, one year earlier before her and Maru originally met.
